text: The Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem from Peregrinatio in terram sanctam (1486) by Bernhard von Breidenbach. Bernhard von Breidenbach (also Breydenbach) (ca. 1440-1497) was a politician in the Electorate of Mainz. He wrote a travel report, Peregrinatio in terram sanctam (1486), from his travels to the Holy Land.
